page.title: 05Before Vietnam............
page.content: I live in Newtown,at 12,Colwyn Terrace in the county of Powys.I have been living here for four years.Before I came here{I lived in Vietnam.I came by aeroplane;I don't remember much about it.In Vietnam, where I lived we did not have a garden in the front or the back.In my house in Vietnam upstairs we had one bedroom and downstairs we had one bed.Sone of us slept on mats on the floor.My mum made envelopes in Vietnam,In Newtown she makes earrings.My dad was manager of a factory in Vietnam.There I lived in a big{city;it was called Saigon.
